website_summaries.verdict: A quality, extra-large, steel-frame pool. Somewhat costly, but worth the price.
pros: Spacious and strong with steel frame and durable laminated PVC sidewalls
Drain plug can be connected to a hose
All-inclusive set with sand filter pump, ladder, ground cloth, cover, maintenance kit, and volleyball set
cons: Proper assembly requires a large, level, firm area
Due to its size, setup can take a while

customer_reviews.title: Summer is going to be a blast!!
customer_reviews.text: To began I want to stay that this pool is huge, that is a plus the preparation is most important due to the ground must be level. I used 4 yards of sand along with 18 inch pavers and 260 lbs of salt for my salt water system. Water is holding crystal clear. Pump is beyond efficient at this point. Super pumped on the build.
customer_reviews.author: alfonso casillas

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have been using Intex pools for about five years now. This pool is great for a family of seven. We have taught our kids how to swim in this pool. This upgraded version is even better! I recommend using plywood to be what the pool lays on. I learned that from Intex themselves, great support.
customer_reviews.author: oakleytiger

customer_reviews.title: Level ground
customer_reviews.text: Great value my last one at last at me 8 years. This new XTR model looks like he’ll even last longer. Easy set up once you get the ground level. All parts were there and went together easily.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY TULLIS

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Up and running(with modifications, I installed a thru wall skimmer) and have ZERO complaints about it so far.
customer_reviews.author: hbic3

customer_reviews.title: Easy maintenance, nice size, well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: I have two boys ages 16 and 9. Perfect for them both. A really nice size pool. We can do some laps in it instead of swimming in circles. I have always wanted a rectangle pool, I am so happy with the purchase of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality/Upgrade Early
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pool for my family. I did my research and heard the smaller pumps can sometimes be just enough and NOT robust. I purchased the 16 inch Intex sandfilter pump. WAY worth it! Cycles through this 20 foot pool in 3 hours. Pool liner is thick and heavy. The XTR is on a whole different level of Quality. Tubing is powder coated inside and out, the T joints are well engineered and made of strong g plastic. We're super happy with this pool! I leveled the ground in my yard (can be daunting) because mine wasn't level and ran PVC to keep the pupm close to my house outlet. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: NEVER BUY INTEX PRODUCTS  Intex and the company is the most difficult to work with
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pool in April took it out of box May 20th to set it up. We have well water, so we had to have water delivered and it cost $325. The water was delivered May 23rd and the liner had 3 holes in it. We called Intex for help and they wanted us to CUT THE WORD INTEX OUT OF THE SIDE OF THE LINER and mail it to them before they would offer any help. This would cause all of the water to leak out and then it would cost another $325 to get it filled again, therefore causing the water to cost as much as the pool.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: NOT RELIABLE OR SAFE MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: We literally just bought this pool last week. We were leveling the ground and had to set it up to ensure it was leveled enough. The wind got a hold of it and one of the “STEEL” beams literally RIPPED. It wasn’t some crazy wind either. I was outside when it happened. I called Intex warranty department and she argued with me and said they won’t replace the beams or anything else. I’m so disappointed and now have to tell our kids we can’t have a pool and we can’t afford to replace this either.
customer_reviews.author: Kdenniston

customer_reviews.title: huge box
customer_reviews.text: The box is huge. I have not set it up but my neighbor Has one and loves it. I just ordered the automatic vacuum as well. Looking forward to the summer
customer_reviews.author: Rob K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this pool in May of 2019, Pump went out on pool end of March 2020. Emailed Intex a couple of time about getting a replacement pump. Intex advised me to go on the website and order the pump. I emailed them back letting them know that the pump showed out of stock inline. Received an email back stating to just keep going to their website until it showed in stock. I am now looking at buying another pump and filter of another brand locally, so that I can use my pool.Do NOT recommend you buy an Intex pool.
customer_reviews.author: J Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: great pool
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we've bought, the first on stayed with our house when we sold. The salt water system makes upkeep simple. We love it. setup is simple just pay attention to all the connections. Get the salt from WallyWorld.
customer_reviews.author: BKA

customer_reviews.title: Intex Pool
customer_reviews.text: We have had it running about a week and so far think it is really great. There are about three points in the process where more than one person (preferably four) are needed for assembly of this size pool but for less than an hour altogether. I did it largely by myself over a period of a week including picking up sand for leveling, getting a pad since it is set on concrete in my case, and finding the pool salt. It seems to have everything one could need and we are running it with salt water, which I like so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to assemble, perfect size for our family of three, also added a saltwater filter from Intex. so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You must hardwire this to your house! Or it will break.
customer_reviews.text: Beware, this pool will not work unless you pay an electrician to wire it to your house. If you use an extension cord it will break, and intex will not help you. Hope this helps, I learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: trophyhusband

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Here goes....
customer_reviews.text: The pressure gauge and 6 way valve were defective. I called Intex and had a horrible experience (Will spare the details). Hung up and called Amazon. They are sending me a whole new pump and a gift card. That's customer service! I've had other problems with Intex pools- they need to fix their quality control issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Louise

customer_reviews.title: Huge pool enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: This pool is amazing and big! We had a super sand pump filter we attached to it just because it is a super pump but the one that comes with it is great to, I'll use it as a back up pump if needed
customer_reviews.author: Leslee

customer_reviews.title: VERY POOR QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: This is 2 years in a row we’ve purchased this pool, both years it’s come with holes in the liner. Do not waste your money OR time ! Beyond frustrated with Intex POOR quality!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Plan carefully, quality item but ever fluctuating
customer_reviews.text: Like the pool, watch the ever fluctuating price. And it will be sub contracted to a fly by night freight carrier that may over promise and under deliver. I will follow up with a better review on the pool once up and running. But with the service I have experienced this far I am not optimistic
customer_reviews.author: Jon p

customer_reviews.title: 2 year warrenty is BS
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this pool for Christmas for the kids and was just recently set up this month. After we filled with water noticed a pin hole leak that was clearly from the manufacturer. Went through the website and filed a claim and it was denied because of time period expired. It is advertised 2 year warrenty all over the box and site. I was clearly within a 6 month span much less 2 years. Intext company has crappy customer service guess I will go with Coleman pool next time
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: Great PT pool for our grand daughters!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Intex pool/ the last one lasted 9 years. We are in southern Arizona, so our pools get used daily by our girls and most of the kids in the neighbor hood. Fairly easy to put together. It is better to have extra hands because of the size. Since we have to have an ADA pool lift we had to build a deck, so we don't have to use the cheepy ladder. Works great for us.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Leydic

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool!!! My kids love it. We are really enjoying it. Very easy to set up and get going.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this pool!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pool! It has exceeded my expectations in every way. The ordering process was quick and easy. It was delivered within three days! My husband installed it and put it up easily. The quality of the pool and materials is great! I am so happy! Would definitely recommend this pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: The price and size was just what we was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Richard chad vantilburg

customer_reviews.title: Best deal hands down
customer_reviews.text: Great product awesome shipping experience very happy with the whole purchase
customer_reviews.author: BRAD

customer_reviews.title: China junk!
customer_reviews.text: Everything Intex is made in China. I sent them a message and they ask me to explain simple English. I will never buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pfost

customer_reviews.title: Love it now that it’s finally up
customer_reviews.text: The box says 60 minutes and you are ready for water. Maybe if you have 10 people and you are putting it on a concrete pad. It was a lot more work to put together than I expected but it’s finally up and I love it. It seems to be sturdy and better quality materials than previous box pools I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Pump died after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Pump died after using for 3 months. It was in dry storage. Can trace power to the pump so I know the pump is getting power. Intex doesn't have a web form for warranty lookup or ticket creation so its not an easy fix. Warranty states that it is 2 years. Guess well see what happens. Until then not happy and terrible product. It should work at least 2-3 years minimum.
customer_reviews.author: SRC

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: We recently upgraded our above ground pool, and have to say this is well worth the $! Setup was time consuming, as it usually is with an above ground pool, but materials and parts seem much sturdier than the pool we had prior! The sand filter is a huge perk as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality investment
customer_reviews.text: Way better quality then the ones you get at Walmart.. especially the pump
customer_reviews.author: AreikUSA

customer_reviews.title: Pool has holes
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice pool and set up. I liked the ones I've bought before, but this was shipped to me with holes needing repaired right out of the box. Even second hand I could get one without holes, and I have. For the money, I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check the liner for holes
customer_reviews.text: The setup went as planned. The box it came in was undamaged. Put about an inch of water in the pool and there was a leak in the bottom. Started looking around the rest off the pool and found about 6 holes. Could not see them until the pool was fully assembled. Check the liner good after you set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Pump quit after a month! Update
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED JUNE 8 2020 I finally spoke with a representative this morning.. once i send in proof of purchase from Amazon my new pump.should be sent!! Yay! WILL UPDATE STARS WHEN PUMP ARRIVES! I am hoping intex sees this review. I have tried calling to no avail. Our pump was set up correctly, was working with no problems and quit. The reset and test button on the plug in started making sparking ticking noises. Trying to figure out how to get a new pump before my whole 12x24 turns green!!! Paid over 2 grand....lasted a month. Will update review when intex responds and makes good on their services.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyBeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect other than the ladder
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I assembled this by ourselves (and I’m currently pregnant) our backyard is already pretty level so we took our chances and set it up without leveling it prior, and it turned out perfect! We set it up in a couple hours and put the hose in over night, by the next day it was done around 3pm. The pump works amazing and we’ve had no issues. The ladder however is very unstable, we ordered a different one ASAP. I don’t even think the ladder is safe whatsoever I can’t believe intex includes this ladder! Other than that we love the pool and it was well worth the price for the quality and size!
customer_reviews.author: Cb

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE OUR POOL SO MUCH♡
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment...definately a labor of love getting the ground ready and prepared...the directions are easy to follow.... I am 55 years old so it took me a 3 days to assemble because as a wife and mother I had other obligations to do as well but it all was well worth taking my time and completing each step. The company for this product has been extremely helpful and very accommodating ...they value thier customers and that means alot to me☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Debra H.

customer_reviews.title: Great pool!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this up for over a month now. The only problem we had was thinking the ground was level, then finding it was not after water was added and it compacted the soil. Be sure your site is nice and level before setting this up. Pros: The liner is nice and heavy duty, the frame is easy to assemble and quite sturdy. Cons: The pool cover is very fragile and likely will not last long. It is also quite difficult to put on, requiring at least 2 or 3 people. This is a rather minor annoyance though, since everything else is high quality.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: This Pool is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pool and definitely worth the price! It's very heavy duty and holds my son and all his friends for summertime fun. The instructions were great & easy to follow. There's so much room in this huge pool. We absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome above ground pool
customer_reviews.text: We put our pool up about 2 months. It arrived fairly quickly. I don't remember how long it took to put it up, but it wasn't hard. We bought the saltwater system. We were swimming the next day. Crystal clear, no hassle with alot of chemicals. Salt water system is a little more buy well worth it. Family is really enjoying the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Everything what the picture said it was When shipped protected with a double box protected !
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Not have with this pool
customer_reviews.text: Pool has no place for vacuuming an no skimmer how ya gonna keep it. Lean. Just put it up we had one before by pro series an loved it just put this up an hate it already
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Delivery is inconvenient!
customer_reviews.text: Its sitting in my barn. Price was great. Delivery was inconvenient......had to go thru 3 days of not showing up with it. I live in a rural area so it was not easy to get down my road. Husband had to meet truck on 3rd day and pick it up. DELIVERY Company does not leave voicemails. You have to call and reschedule over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, from the factory, a Seam in one of the corners at the bottom leaked, and is still leaking. NONE of the hose connections for the filter pump would tighten properly, causing them ALL to leak as the pool was being filed. Had to actually plug all 3 openings on the pool with the plugs provided in order to bypass the pump. Will have to look to other options of filtration.
customer_reviews.author: all-access customer

customer_reviews.title: No basket filter or chlorinator for such an expensive pool with sand filter.
customer_reviews.text: Although sturdy, easy to assemble, and rugged. The Sand Filter model I ordered ($700+) did not even come with a chlorinator or basket filter- the most basic of water needs and certainly something that should have been included for so much money. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: StPauli76

customer_reviews.title: 4+ years and I just bought my 2nd
customer_reviews.text: just bought my 2nd one to replace one I had for 4 years, it probably could have lasted longer but the liner on the top of the rails is getting frayed. it's a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: jake huett

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool
customer_reviews.text: This pool is huge! It’s easy to assemble with the exception of connecting the very last top rail. It definitely takes some muscle. My husband probably could have connected it a lot easier than I could have but my 3 children (7,10,&11years old) and I managed to get it together ourselves while my husband was at work. It’s nice and sturdy and has gotten a lot of use so far! I definitely recommend this pool.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Russelburg

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set up bout 90 min
customer_reviews.text: Got the 18’x9’ didnt think it would be big enough but its plenty big an seems deep very happy
customer_reviews.author: Bob Supernor

customer_reviews.title: Recent purchase of 24x24 6/2020! Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: To whomever just purchased this pool!!! If it has duct tape on top of the box! We just returned it because it was damaged!!! Check the bottom of the box!! The liner has a hole in it! Also I paid 1,061.00 in March the price has tripled!!!!!! 24x24ft!!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTS ON PRODUCT NO SOLUTION
customer_reviews.text: I brought this one in June 12 and started show defects in less than 3 months .. I have called over and over never got solution .... the pool has a many defects I’m very disappointed with this buy basically I LOST MONEY .😒😒😒 don’t WAIST YOUR BUYING THIS ONE POOL BC IF U PRESENT ANY COMPLAINTS they will make u lose ur time in calls till the guarantee expires 😔😔😔 1300 dollars throw it to the trash 🗑 🥺🥺
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Meraz

customer_reviews.title: Family of 5 love it.
customer_reviews.text: We love our pool! We got the pool in May of this year and have used it at least 6 times a week. We have a family of 5 and it has plenty of room. The pump is amazing. I will say be careful moving the pump not to grab the gauge because I accidentally broke ours off. Definitely worth the money. The pump is worth half the price! It’s kept our pool crystal clear, and all I do is add one pack of shock a week, and two 3 inch chlorine tablets once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Pump, Weak Legs
customer_reviews.text: Pumps are defective, Beware. Legs are not sturdy enough. Junk. Had to order new leg separate. Received refund on pool, but not on the 88.00 leg we had to order or the extra pad I ordered. Just, please BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool. Shipping is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: The pool is great and sturdy so far. VM Express were good to work with (sellers). However, if R+L freight is selected as delivery provider I would opt out. We had nothing but issues and were told we could schedule a delivery window which was not true. They had my pool loaded and ready for delivery without even contacting me (I was at work!) Seller did their best to remedy the situation but it was out of their control. Anyway, the pool seems much more sturdy than the standard blue ones. I like the programmable pump and no hassle with disposable filters.
customer_reviews.author: Twiztedpeanuts

customer_reviews.title: It's been just over a month, but so far we love this pool.
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence on the size, bigger is better. Also super happy we went with the rectangle instead of round. I feel like I can actually swim laps, even though I only bought the 24'. Putting the cover on the rectangle one is much easier than the circle, unless you get the cover that just floats on the top. I later purchased the Intex auto vacuum, which is a must buy! It works great as well. I also recommend getting the skimmer too. Both of these additions has made maintaining the pool and absolute breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good pool
customer_reviews.text: The pool seems to be very sturdy and exactly what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Nandini Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend 4 people for set up. The poles you run through the liner lube up for easy sliding, you don’t want to tear the liner. Have three people for liner, holding it up to make sure for holes to line up and sliding the pole through the liner. When installing the upright legs have two on each end of the pool holding up side of pool to install legs. Very easy set up. Very sturdy , well built. Make sure ground is level before installation. If everything is done right you have a beautiful pool!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Olney

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this pool. After filling with water one leg bent and popped out of the frame making the $1,000 pool unusable. They no longer sell replacement legs for this model so we are stuck attempting to part out the pool to make some of the money back. Absolutely awe full experience with the company who sold it to us, as well as this intex product. NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Best Summer Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until we’ve used the pool a good bit to write a review. The pool was extremely easy for myself and my husband to put up by ourselves. It didn’t take too long to fill up either considering it’s large size. We have been through a couple power and water bills and power hasn’t changed for us. Our water bill was only $30 more to fill the entire pool (which I would say was a good deal). We’ve have friends and family over several times and this pool fits people comfortably! I’m so happy we got this pool! Definitely a great deal for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: AThomas

customer_reviews.title: Beware, the pump is not sufficient for this size pool!
customer_reviews.text: The pool itself, the frame and the liner are fine. I am extremely disappointed with the pump that they sell you with this size pool. If you run pump 24 hours a day it still does not keep the pool clean and the water clear!! The pump they sell you is too small for this pool! I would like very much a credit for this pump I am happy to send it back. I need to buy a larger pump, which is going to cost me more money in order to keep this pool clean! The pool itself is useless without a pump that is sufficient for this amount of water. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I live in the desert heat near Carson City Nv. Heat really drains me and with MS doubly so. Ordered the pool and it arrived a week early, AMAZING. Put it together in 96 degree heat on Aug. 1st. was not fun but no fault to the pool. Was able to use pool Aug. 2nd. So god willing that we don't have any sand storms or thunder storms, I will enjoy using everyday. Lost two pounds in two days too LOL that is always a plus
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME POOL - SO SO FILTER
customer_reviews.text: PRO: The pool is great. Pretty simple to assemble. Thick vinyl & solid metal. Having had other INTEX pools, this is by far the most robust. CON: The filter seems like is hsould be great, but it loses pressure constantly. In part this is because the inlets get jammed with everything it seems... and if it makes it past the inlet, it gets jammmed in the skimmer basket. AND thats not to imply there's a skimmer. YOU NEED TO GET A SEPARATE SKIMMER.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS AND WARRANTY CARD! Need help
customer_reviews.text: This pool came with missing parts , I was told to call manufacturer, on hold half the day still no one to talk to BECAUSE THEY WANT THE WARRENTY CARD WHICH IS MISSING !
customer_reviews.author: Michele Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Make the plastic metal
customer_reviews.text: I love that the pool is so big. Okay, let’s talk about all the little springs white cuffs. For over $2,000 you think they can make the white clips that interlock all the poles better. I went to try to put up my pool six of them broke. Now you have to have these parts or the poles won’t lock into place. Try to get some extras on the website sold everywhere. Checked every place you can imagine. That is a disgrace and they should make some type of metal to interlock the poles.
customer_reviews.author: Hg

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: So far, the product came as specified. It's still too cold to run, but easy no hassle delivery. So far we are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great pool!
customer_reviews.text: Great pool! We had a previous 16' round & upgraded after weed whacking a hole, but it lasted 4 years until that happened. Searched & searched until we found this. Loved the different square design. Truly a great size pool. Leveling is the hardest part, took most of the day but was filling by night. We used 12 foot by 10 inch treated lumber to put under then length of the legs & leveled. Seems to be a better choice then the recommended 15x15 piece under each leg.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn F.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. First summer. Easy to install did it by myself. The hardest part was leveling the ground. I put 1.5 pink hard foam under so you don't feel the ground and it's warmer I think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. Shipped in two days with no damage. Decent size for a family of 5. Easy to clean. Only additional part that didnt come with it is the skimmer. My husband put it together in one day by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Kamila

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Watched multiple videos for st up on this type of pool. Did not go up as quickly as hoped even having a good idea of what to expect and two people assembling. Overall it wasn't too bad though. Make sure ground is level! Got ours within an inch from one end to the other, walls are good and straight at top rails. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Johawk

customer_reviews.title: Love this pool for the price
customer_reviews.text: The family love the pool. Very easy to assembly. Many hours of fun I had an Intex in the past and this one is much better. The filter system so powerful, had no problems with suction. The pool is very sturdy. Make sure your ground is level prior to placing your pool.
customer_reviews.author: shelton holden

customer_reviews.title: PUMP AND FILTER TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: The 10" sand filter and pump are too small for this pool, needs to come with at least a 12" filter and pump. After getting everything up and running the pump seized up after 2 days, called Intex, they agreed to send me a new pump, however it took a week to receive it, meanwhile needless to say my pool water was nasty without circulation. After I installed new pump, water flow was still horrible, ordered 14" filter and pump, installed and WOW now I can actually feel water pressure from the return. There also needs to be a thru wall skimmer included. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Horst

customer_reviews.title: Do what you say you'll do!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! My wife and I tried going through Walmart.com for this pool to save a little money...catastrophe! Amazon, even this third party seller, has been an amazing experience. I set this pool up with my kids, ages 13, 10, and 8. No problems and was a fun project. I haven't turned the pump on yet. So I'll rate expecting that it is as good as everything else so far. Awesome buy from worry free seller. Thank you Amazon and the third party seller.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: The directions were God awful, we needed 6 men to put it up, as it is large and you can bend the poles if you don't have enough help. They don't tell you that if you put the arms into the ground that they will sink, if you put it on top of anything it could rip the arm pieces at the bottom of the pool. I would have ordered an aluminum pool if I knew all the problems with the INtex pool. Because we live in the east, we have to take it down in the winter, this was not disclosed, what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and it seems sturdy, except for the ladder.
customer_reviews.text: Had an Intex 16x48 pool that lasted 12 years. Hope this one has the same or better durability. The ladder is a little flimsy and it wobbles and twists. I’m 200lb and it is rated for 300lb. I thought the dual inlets would be nice so I could have a skimmer on one, but the suction is really reduced with both inlets open. They send a suction reduction thing to put in the non-skimmer inlet but it causes to much cavitation and that hose will eventually fill up with air which is not good once it hits the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell E Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pool. Was definitely worth the price the sand filter works amazingly. Will definitely buy a more expensive sand filter in the future, but as of right now it does the job. You could definitely have about 13 people in the pool as long as there is no rough housing. Really durable and the installation took maybe less than an hour as long as your following the instructions and your doing this with a partner. Took awhile to get here but that was understandable. Had a huge truck drop it off and it had an excellent driver that was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dayanara

customer_reviews.title: We did it again.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the same pool we bought eight years ago. The granddaughters really enjoyed the first one, and so did we, but it was starting to “show its age.” Some things have been upgraded, but basically, the pool features are the same. When this pool appeared as a Deal of the Day, the price was fantastic, and we couldn’t resist. We are really happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: grammarqueen

customer_reviews.title: great pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 16x32 pool. It came with everything needed to set it up and use it. This is the first pool i've owned and I managed to set it up correctly. It took me 4 hours to set it up by myself and it wasn't easy. And considering this is an above ground pool that holds over 14,000 gallons of water, it is very sturdy and well built. I definitely recommend it for anyone that wants a pool big enough to swim in and play games, or just float around.
customer_reviews.author: zach warren

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase until ground is ready
customer_reviews.text: Used a lazer level and took weeks to get the ground correct. Put up the pool and it is beautiful. Added water and one of the stabilizer cloths from the pool leg tore and lost 1/3 of the water. It took too long to get the ground ready and the warranty ran out. If you are thinking of buying this pool prepare the ground FIRST.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Need 2x12 cut to 12-14 inch to place under side braces or you'll be sorry
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little longer than 1 HR to set up..lol..maybe in perfect world with 20 helpers and concrete floor..not to bad other wise..wouldnt have bought it if I had known you need to cut chunks of 2x10 or 2x12 to support the side braces from sinking down into the ground..so now have to do magic landscape tricks to hide all the lumber laying on the ground around the pool...looks like hell..no mention of this during the sales ad..lots of extras to buy after set up...and ladder is not built for this pool..way undersized..pool works though....$450.00 for 9,000 gallons of water...so after extras and water and things your not made aware of..cost is more like $4,300.00
customer_reviews.author: Donald Morgan

customer_reviews.title: We are enjoying this pool a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Much more work to set up than we expected. The vacuum doesn’t have great suction, but is ok. We didn’t get ours perfectly level. It is about 2 inches deeper on one end, but it seems to be holding up great. We’ve had it up about 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the time to set this up yet but this is our 3rd one in 15 years so my review is based on past experience
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Spurrier

customer_reviews.title: Great pool!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Definitely worth the price. My family and I are having a great time. Shipping was fast and the product came as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Holp

customer_reviews.title: Leaking out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Box appeared to have been opened then re-taped. All parts were enclosed and seemed intact. However, when filling the pool we found it leaking . After 3 thousand plus dollars I'm regretting the purchase and would tear down and send back if time allowed. Fifteen grandkids coming into town to spend time with us and this happens, very disappointed. Updated review, grandkids arrive and ready to swim, proceed to set ladder into pool, oh wait it's the wrong ladder for the pool. Had to modify by drilling new holes so ladder would sit on bottom of pool. Amazing start to our summer with grandkids!!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer fun!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this pool! After reading hundreds of reviews we went with this rectangular style and were so glad we did. Long enough to actually get a good swim for the kids who are learning. It’s a beast to put together and definitely requires a few people but it’s very sturdy. Like every other person, reviewer said, it’s very important to level the ground. You’ll want large pavers to hold the legs - ours shifted back and are nearly falling off so I’d suggest larger one - two foot squares under each leg to adjust for the shifting. Other than that, we have loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney M

customer_reviews.title: Pump leaking
customer_reviews.text: My pump has started leaking after a couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Missing leaf guard on sand fikter pump
customer_reviews.text: Well the pool seems sturdy and good sand filter pump is missing the leaf filter so can't turn on my pump Cant get ahold of amazon or intex to ship missing part. # 12099
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Most reliable product
customer_reviews.text: This Intex pool is the hit of our summer! It is the second Intex pool we have purchased in the past seven years. They are relatively easy to assemble and are very sturdy. The saltwater filter system is great! This pool is a lifesaver during our COVID 19 quarantined summer. The children love it and so do the adults. We are very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M. Kite

customer_reviews.title: Love the pool
customer_reviews.text: It came on time. It is easier to put together with a couple of people helping. Took about one hour to assemble. I’d say took most of the day to fill up with water. You do need sand for the water system to keep it clean. I tried to put on the cover it came off after I put it on. We are very happy with the pool there wasn’t anything wrong with it. Make sure your ground is level before adding water and take out wrinkles on bottom. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Steen

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool, but the entire process turned out to be pricey.
customer_reviews.text: We spent two days putting the pool together and realized we are missing all of the parts that hook to the side wall of the pool. The customer service of this seller was excellent and immediately resolved our issues. However the Intex company itself was rude and could not answer any of our questions. Worst customer service. They should get training from the seller on how to properly handle customer service. Overall the pool is very nice and big.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Benson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition, on two wooden pallets. When we opened it up, there was a small scuff on the outside, but it does not seem to be a leak, at least so far. Mostly easy to set up with two people. The pump is a bit underpowered for this large a pool. We will probably upgrade to the 16” sand filter. We had some adapters on hand from a previous pool, which were necessary for setting up using one intake and one output.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Butcaris

customer_reviews.title: Would not by again
customer_reviews.text: Fairly nice pool would have been 5 stars but has a leak in the bottom somewhere pretty disappointing. Looks like it might be a seam.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 18ft across 52inch high. Really did a ton of research because I needed a good pool to do physical therapy in, since a should have been fatal accident has left me unable to move my leg unless in water. Really a great pool and has really met my expectations for excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Mizell

customer_reviews.title: Make sure property is level
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was a problem they gave no notice of delivery other than a 5 day window and the power gate on there truck was broke this pool weight is 400 pounds and requires a machine to unload I own a tractor with forks but was at work when it arrived and was told it had to be unloaded that day or else luckily there was a construction site near buy and I called in a favor and had it unloaded .
customer_reviews.author: Mike bedner

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I thought this was a good deal. I bought one with a sand filter and assumed it would last at least a few years. Just after a year the pump froze up. Neither myself or Amazon were able to get in touch with Intex for the supposed warranty. I tried to use a different pump but intex pumps use a much smaller hose diameter. Now the hoses are all splitting and its only 16 months old. Buyer beware and actually I’m amazed and disappointed that they still sell these pools knowing the manufacturer can not be contacted for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great above ground pool
customer_reviews.text: Great swim pool but took way longer to put together than they said.... even studying all the you tube videos and other reviews. Been enjoying it still this late summer. Will hate to give it up when the cold comes in here in south east Texas.
customer_reviews.author: LFAllen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pool and no leaks!
customer_reviews.text: This pool was the 18’x52”! It went up easy, liner was very heavy and need two people to spread out! We removed the liner from the box it was shipped in and rolled it into a sled so we could haul it where we wanted! No leaks and sand pump was awesome! Number 20 silica sand worked great and used almost 50 pounds! The pool is very sturdy and doesn’t move at all! Getting lots of use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: We have been through a few Intex pools and were disappointed by the cheap materials. This particular pool, however, is surprisingly sturdy and tough. It has been up for a couple of months now and we have no issues at all. The sand pump/filter is much better than the traditional filters. No more changing out the cartridge type filters! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy for 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Took about an hour to set up and about 15 hours to fill. Family was enjoying the cool water the next day! Love this
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pool as a replacement to our other 18x52 Intex. Nice pool for family of four. Plenty of room. We upgraded this time and added the salt water chlorine system and slimmer and it’s perfect! Some headlines for this pool and even the instructions say it takes an hour to put together, it’s more like 3, but still an easy set up. Make sure your area is level!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: kinked support bars
customer_reviews.text: I have two kinked support bars and I don't know what to do. I am afraid that if I just beef the two up, it will still break and my pool will then be damaged. Is there a way to get two of the support bars that aren't kinked?
customer_reviews.author: Lee H

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pump Parts to kit.
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if the important parts to the pump came in the box. So make sure you open the boxes, read ALL the parts lists before any assembly. FYI, manufacturer is closed for business on weekends. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pool, cheap finish. Could be better with one simple change
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointing in the crappy tarp it came with for the under mat. I was excepting an thicker plastic that was black or blue so it matched the pool. It comes with a cheesy gray plastic cheep tarp. Easily torn and extremely thin.
customer_reviews.author: john w

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble and extremely sturdy. Thought we were level but not quite and even though it’s got a deep end, it’s still holding up and hasn’t collapsed lol. Lost a star for the pump. Although better than a cartridge filter pump, it’s not quite powerful enough. We will probably upgrade the pump next year. Glad we purchased this pool and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: bugsinlove

customer_reviews.title: Great summer fun.
customer_reviews.text: The relationship with the seller of the pool did not start out happy! The problem was delivery of the pool. The contract to deliver was given to a carrier who only came to our area once a week on a Thursday! The pool was picked up on Thursday evening after the deliveries had been put on the truck! With that over & done with the pool is great! My grandchildren & neighbors love the pool. It’s well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Clubb

product_meta.title: Intex 24ft X 12ft X 52in Ultra XTR Rectangular Pool Set with Sand Filter Pump, Ladder, Ground Cloth & Pool Cover
product_meta.description: Style:Rectangular| Size:24ft X 12ft X 52inUniquely designed frame combines high quality galvanized steel with precision engineered locking system, enhancing the overall quality, durability & stability of the pools. Rust resistance: encapsulating inner & outer powder coating ensures the ultimate resistance to rust. 2-Year manufacturer's warranty. Includes 110-120V sand filter pump with pump flow rate of 2, 100 GPH, pool ladder, ground cloth & pool cover. Ready for water in 60 Min. Water capacity (90%): 8, 403 gallon.
feature_bullets: Uniquely designed frame combines high quality galvanized Steel with Precision engineered locking system, enhancing the overall quality, durability and stability of the pools
Rust resistance: encapsulating inner and outer powder coating ensures the ultimate resistance to rust
Includes 110-120V sand filter pump with pump flow Rate of 2, 100 gallons per hour, pool ladder, ground cloth and pool cover.Recommended for ages 6 and up
Ready for water in 60 minutes. Water capacity (90%): 8, 403 gallons

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,157 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
